TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1056
TEI.2.document_title: Jas E. B. Austin to Unknown, 03-15-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Price list, March 15, 1825. Price of powder.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: Taking the oath to the Federal Constitution. See next document, Austin to Gonzales, March 16, 1825
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1056

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Price list, March 15, 1825. Price of powder.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p*Price List */p* m
*p*Bill of Powder furnished on the *date_mentioned n="03-12-1825">12th inst*/date_mentioned* for the celebration of that day */p* *p*" 30 lbs Powder @ $1.00_______________________ $30. 00*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-15-1825">15th March 1825*/date_mentioned* paid*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jas. E. B. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
